meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Quin Marissa Goldsmith Tom Nissley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6050.

td.p: Chris Quin, an attorney from Atlanta, Georgia
Marissa Goldsmith, a web developer from Springfield, Virginia
Tom Nissley, an online books editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 8-day cash winnings total $235,405)

tr.td: CHRISTIANITY
FOOTBALL: 20-10
LET'S GET READY TO ROOMBA!
PUNDITS
FAMILY VALUES
I WANT "MOR"

Chris
')

Marissa

ANCIENT HISTORY

THE HOUSE OF THE 7 GERBILS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
